# EV385-242144 | Saskatchewan Penitentiary | SIU Upgrades
=================================
**Title**: EV385-242144: Upgrades to the Structured Intervention Unit (SIU) at the Saskatchewan Penitentiary
**Reference Number**: WS4546525591-Doc4546562035
**Publication Date**: May 22, 2024
**Tender Closing Date**: July 25, 2024, 14:00 EDT (Changed from previous deadline)

**Procurement Details**
------------------------

*   The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites proposals for the renovation of the Structured Intervention Unit (SIU) at the Saskatchewan Penitentiary, Prince Albert, Saskatchewan.
*   The project will involve interior and exterior renovations to facilitate time outside of cells for inmates held in segregation.
*   The work includes converting a kitchenette to a program room, creating a common room space, associated detention doors, and upgrades to HVAC, lighting, inmate telephone systems, camera, and intercom systems.
*   Optional site visit on May 29, 2024, at 13:00 CST.

**Note on Bidding**
------------------

*   The procurement is limited to bidding among Indigenous businesses (refer to SI 01).
*   Bidders must submit their proposals by July 25, 2024, at 14:00 EDT. Any proposals received after this deadline will be declared non-responsive.

**Important Contact and Logistics Information**
---------------------------------------------

*   For more information, contact Vinay Singh, SPAC/PSPC, via email at vinay.singh@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca or visit the [Ariba Discovery](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19784626?extsite=MTk3ODQ2MjZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==) website.
*   All proposals must be submitted electronically in accordance with the instructions provided on the Ariba Discovery website.
*   The project schedule and timeline will be discussed during the optional site visit on May 29, 2024.
